modules.name: Invoice
modules.description: Manages invoice lifecycle including creation, payment tracking, and cancellation.

commands.name: CreateInvoice
commands.description: Creates a new invoice for a customer.

input.name: customerId
input.description: The customer who will own the invoice.

commands.name: CancelInvoice
commands.description: Cancels an existing invoice.

commands.name: MarkInvoiceAsPaid
commands.description: Marks an invoice as paid after payment confirmation.

queries.name: FindInvoice
queries.description: Retrieves an invoice by its identifier.

input.name: id
input.description: The unique identifier of the invoice.

queries.name: ListCustomerInvoices
queries.description: Lists all invoices for a specific customer.

queries.name: GetInvoiceStats
queries.description: Returns invoice statistics for a given period.

domainEvents.name: InvoiceCreated
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a new invoice is created.

properties.name: invoiceId
properties.description: The unique identifier of the invoice.

properties.name: customerId
properties.description: The customer who owns the invoice.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: The total amount of the invoice.

domainEvents.name: InvoiceCancelled
domainEvents.description: Emitted when an invoice is cancelled.

domainEvents.name: InvoicePaid
domainEvents.description: Emitted when an invoice is marked as paid.

eventSubscribers.name: SendInvoiceEmailOnCreated
eventSubscribers.description: Sends an email notification when an invoice is created.

eventSubscribers.name: NotifyAccountingOnPaid
eventSubscribers.description: Notifies the accounting system when an invoice is paid.

modules.name: Payment
modules.description: Handles payment processing, refunds, and payment method management.

commands.name: ProcessPayment
commands.description: Processes a payment for an invoice.

commands.name: RefundPayment
commands.description: Issues a refund for a processed payment.

queries.name: FindPayment
queries.description: Retrieves a payment by its identifier.

queries.name: ListPaymentsByInvoice
queries.description: Lists all payments for an invoice.

domainEvents.name: PaymentProcessed
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a payment is successfully processed.

domainEvents.name: PaymentFailed
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a payment fails.

domainEvents.name: PaymentRefunded
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a payment is refunded.

eventSubscribers.name: MarkInvoiceAsPaidOnPaymentProcessed
eventSubscribers.description: Marks the invoice as paid when payment is processed.

eventSubscribers.name: SendPaymentReceiptOnProcessed
eventSubscribers.description: Sends a payment receipt email to the customer.

eventSubscribers.name: NotifyCustomerOnPaymentFailed
eventSubscribers.description: Notifies the customer when a payment fails.

modules.name: Customer
modules.description: Manages customer registration, profiles, and account lifecycle.

commands.name: RegisterCustomer
commands.description: Registers a new customer in the system.

commands.name: UpdateCustomerProfile
commands.description: Updates an existing customer's profile information.

commands.name: DeactivateCustomer
commands.description: Deactivates a customer account.

queries.name: FindCustomer
queries.description: Retrieves a customer by their identifier.

input.name: id
input.description: The unique identifier of the customer.

queries.name: FindCustomerByEmail
queries.description: Retrieves a customer by their email address.

queries.name: SearchCustomers
queries.description: Searches customers by various criteria.

domainEvents.name: CustomerRegistered
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a new customer is registered.

domainEvents.name: CustomerProfileUpdated
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a customer's profile is updated.

domainEvents.name: CustomerDeactivated
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a customer account is deactivated.

eventSubscribers.name: SendWelcomeEmailOnRegistered
eventSubscribers.description: Sends a welcome email when a customer registers.

eventSubscribers.name: SyncCustomerToCRM
eventSubscribers.description: Syncs customer data to the CRM system.

eventSubscribers.name: UpdateCustomerLoyaltyOnInvoicePaid
eventSubscribers.description: Updates customer loyalty points when an invoice is paid.

eventSubscribers.name: UpdateCustomerStatsOnOrderCompleted
eventSubscribers.description: Updates customer purchase statistics when an order is completed.

modules.name: User
modules.description: Handles user authentication, authorization, and credential management.

commands.name: CreateUser
commands.description: Creates a new user account.

commands.name: ChangeUserPassword
commands.description: Changes a user's password.

commands.name: AssignRoleToUser
commands.description: Assigns a role to a user.

queries.name: FindUser
queries.description: Retrieves a user by their identifier.

queries.name: AuthenticateUser
queries.description: Authenticates a user by email and password.

domainEvents.name: UserCreated
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a new user is created.

domainEvents.name: UserPasswordChanged
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a user's password is changed.

eventSubscribers.name: SendPasswordChangeNotification
eventSubscribers.description: Sends a notification when a user's password is changed.

modules.name: Product
modules.description: Manages product catalog including creation, pricing, publishing, and search.

commands.name: CreateProduct
commands.description: Creates a new product in the catalog.

commands.name: UpdateProduct
commands.description: Updates an existing product.

commands.name: PublishProduct
commands.description: Publishes a product making it visible in the catalog.

commands.name: ArchiveProduct
commands.description: Archives a product removing it from the active catalog.

queries.name: FindProduct
queries.description: Retrieves a product by its identifier.

queries.name: ListProducts
queries.description: Lists products with filtering and pagination.

queries.name: SearchProducts
queries.description: Full-text search for products.

domainEvents.name: ProductCreated
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a new product is created.

domainEvents.name: ProductPublished
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a product is published.

domainEvents.name: ProductPriceChanged
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a product's price changes.

domainEvents.name: ProductArchived
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a product is archived.

eventSubscribers.name: IndexProductOnCreated
eventSubscribers.description: Indexes the product in the search engine.

eventSubscribers.name: UpdateSearchIndexOnPriceChanged
eventSubscribers.description: Updates the search index when price changes.

eventSubscribers.name: NotifySubscribersOnPublished
eventSubscribers.description: Notifies subscribers when a product is published.

modules.name: Category
modules.description: Organizes products into hierarchical categories for catalog navigation.

commands.name: CreateCategory
commands.description: Creates a new category.

commands.name: UpdateCategory
commands.description: Updates a category's details.

queries.name: FindCategory
queries.description: Retrieves a category by its identifier.

queries.name: ListCategories
queries.description: Lists all categories as a tree structure.

domainEvents.name: CategoryCreated
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a new category is created.

properties.name: parentId
properties.description: The parent category identifier if any.

modules.name: Order
modules.description: Handles order placement, fulfillment, shipping, and delivery tracking.

commands.name: PlaceOrder
commands.description: Places a new order from a shopping cart.

input.name: items
input.description: The list of items to order.

input.name: billingAddress
input.description: The billing address (defaults to shipping if null).

commands.name: CancelOrder
commands.description: Cancels an order before it's shipped.

commands.name: ShipOrder
commands.description: Marks an order as shipped.

commands.name: CompleteOrder
commands.description: Marks an order as delivered and complete.

queries.name: FindOrder
queries.description: Retrieves an order by its identifier.

queries.name: ListCustomerOrders
queries.description: Lists all orders for a customer.

queries.name: GetOrderTracking
queries.description: Gets shipping tracking information for an order.

domainEvents.name: OrderPlaced
domainEvents.description: Emitted when a new order is placed.

properties.name: itemCount
properties.description: Number of items in the order.

domainEvents.name: OrderShipped
domainEvents.description: Emitted when an order is shipped.

domainEvents.name: OrderCancelled
domainEvents.description: Emitted when an order is cancelled.

domainEvents.name: OrderCompleted
domainEvents.description: Emitted when an order is delivered and completed.

eventSubscribers.name: SendOrderConfirmationOnPlaced
eventSubscribers.description: Sends order confirmation email when order is placed.

eventSubscribers.name: CreateInvoiceOnPlaced
eventSubscribers.description: Creates an invoice when an order is placed.

eventSubscribers.name: SendShippingNotificationOnShipped
eventSubscribers.description: Sends shipping notification with tracking info.

eventSubscribers.name: UpdateInventoryOnPlaced
eventSubscribers.description: Reserves inventory when an order is placed.

eventSubscribers.name: ReleaseInventoryOnCancelled
eventSubscribers.description: Releases reserved inventory when an order is cancelled.

modules.name: Cart
modules.description: Manages shopping cart operations including item management and price updates.

commands.name: AddItemToCart
commands.description: Adds an item to the shopping cart.

commands.name: RemoveItemFromCart
commands.description: Removes an item from the shopping cart.

commands.name: ClearCart
commands.description: Removes all items from the shopping cart.

queries.name: GetCart
queries.description: Retrieves the current shopping cart.

domainEvents.name: ItemAddedToCart
domainEvents.description: Emitted when an item is added to the cart.

domainEvents.name: CartCleared
domainEvents.description: Emitted when the cart is cleared.

eventSubscribers.name: UpdateCartPricesOnProductPriceChanged
eventSubscribers.description: Updates cart item prices when a product price changes.

eventSubscribers.name: RemoveArchivedProductFromCarts
eventSubscribers.description: Removes archived products from active carts.

modules.name: Email
modules.description: Sends transactional and bulk emails with delivery tracking and status monitoring.

commands.name: SendEmail
commands.description: Sends an email to a recipient.

commands.name: SendBulkEmail
commands.description: Sends an email to multiple recipients.

queries.name: GetEmailStatus
queries.description: Gets the delivery status of an email.

domainEvents.name: EmailSent
domainEvents.description: Emitted when an email is sent.

domainEvents.name: EmailDelivered
domainEvents.description: Emitted when an email is delivered.

domainEvents.name: EmailBounced
domainEvents.description: Emitted when an email bounces.

eventSubscribers.name: SendWelcomeEmailOnCustomerRegistered
eventSubscribers.description: Sends a welcome email when a new customer registers.

eventSubscribers.name: SendShippingEmailOnOrderShipped
eventSubscribers.description: Sends shipping notification email when an order is shipped.

eventSubscribers.name: SendPaymentReceiptOnPaymentProcessed
eventSubscribers.description: Sends payment receipt email when a payment is processed.

eventSubscribers.name: SendRefundConfirmationOnPaymentRefunded
eventSubscribers.description: Sends refund confirmation email when a payment is refunded.
